version_description:
- Adding Kurdish locality support
- Improving search for businesses by introducing smart offline search capabilities
- Simplifying the sign up process further
- Improving performance of image and content loading for businesses and marketplace under severely slow internet connection
- Adding animation effects for smooth transitions between pages
- Adding categories for local businesses for easy browsing
- Improved business map location precision

- Updating Pure Platform Marketplace to simplify navigation.
- Implementing Pure Platformâ€™s Universal Shopping Cart concept, which is the first globally.
- This release includes the integration with Amazon, Sephora and Sketchers brands.
- Adding real-time automatic product price updating capabilities.
- Updating the Business page (search and map) to show businesses that sell Kidus.
- Updating the Order page and adding tracking details information.
- Updating the Transaction page and adding transaction details. 
- Other enhancements.

- Adding SHEIN to the list of global stores.
- Usability and functionality enhancements.

- Adding expected delivery time in user cart and orders.
- Adding tracking for all items from US to Iraq.
- Refresh global stores.
- Simplify cart and order calculations.
- UI enhancement.

- The user will be able to confirm receipt of products. 
- 3-D secure support for added customer protection. 
- Customers will be able to specify temporary location and number to receive delivered products. 
- Other enhancements and framework upgrades.
- Sign in with social media account fixes
